Package com.paiondata.aristotle.service

Interface UserService

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService
Service implementation for user-related operations. This class provides methods for managing users, including creating, updating, and deleting users.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    UserDTO
    createUser(UserDTO user)
    Creates a new user.
    void
    deleteUser(List<String> oidcids)
    Deletes multiple users along with their related graphs and graph nodes.
    List<UserVO>
    getAllUsers()
    Retrieves all users as UserVOs.
    UserVO
    getUserVOByOidcid(String oidcid)
    Retrieves a UserVO by OIDC ID.
    void
    updateUser(UserDTO userDTO)
    Updates an existing user.

  • Method Details

    • getUserVOByOidcid

      UserVO getUserVOByOidcid(String oidcid)
      Retrieves a UserVO by OIDC ID.
      Parameters:
      oidcid - the OIDC ID of the user
      Returns:
      the UserVO containing user details and associated graphs

    • getAllUsers

      List<UserVO> getAllUsers()
      Retrieves all users as UserVOs.
      Returns:
      a list of UserVOs containing user details and associated graphs

    • createUser

      UserDTO createUser(UserDTO user)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the UserCreateDTO containing user details
      Returns:
      the UserDTO containing the created user details

    • updateUser

      void updateUser(UserDTO userDTO)
      Updates an existing user.
      Parameters:
      userDTO - the UserDTO containing updated user details

    • deleteUser

      void deleteUser(List<String> oidcids)
      Deletes multiple users along with their related graphs and graph nodes.
      Parameters:
      oidcids - a list of OIDC IDs of the users to be deleted
